message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper deals with the evaluation of Machine Translation systems, which falls under the category of Natural Language Processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the limitations of current MT systems and proposes ways to improve them, which involves the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) techniques. Hence, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Learning), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper uses image analysis to support its findings, which could fall under the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision).
